name: Off-Road Travel: 4wd SUVs ride to hill
name_original: Off-Road Travel: 4wd SUVs ride to hill
description:
Welcome to the new game about powerful 4wd SUVs, cars and trucks!

If you are a brave fellow, you love extreme sports and are ready to challenge yourself, then this game is for you! Sit behind the wheel of a tractor, truck or SUV and conquer steep slopes and impassable jungle. Places where asphalt is not found, and the road is just the direction for your powerful SUV car!

Game features:
🚗 A variety of off-road vehicles - Tractors, SUVs, trucks
🎮 Choose one of 35 cars - 4x4 SUVs, foreign off-road legends, pickups, monster trucks and rally cars, 6wd trucks
😎 Multiplayer! Fight with other players in online modes!
🔧 Ability to improve each car. Improve the engine, wheels, winch. Tuning is cool!
⛰️ Diverse and beautiful levels. Explore swamps, hills, dunes and tropical beaches. Off-road, rural roads and high mountains, uncharted territory!
👍 Cool 3D graphics. Beautiful dirt, water, glare on your SUV


🔴 GREAT CHOICE OF VEHICLES
It doesn't matter what type of car you like - 4x4 SUVs, buggy, rally car, monster truck, truck, crossover, pickup or tractor. In our game you will be able to drive all types of cars and enjoy off-road racing. Four-wheel drive will help you with this, because the main goal of an SUV is to beat off-road and not be afraid of extreme sports! And if you are a lover of military equipment, then choose an armored troop-carrier, a Hummer, an armored personnel carrier and an amphibious vehicle. Show off-road who is dad here.

🔴 MULTIPLAYER WITH REAL PLAYERS
Participate in off-road races. Offroad does not hurt to defeat your opponent in different 4wd jeeps or buggies. Choose an SUV, get ready and fight a rival in a tense race! Take top positions on the leaderboard and become the best off-road driver. You do not need gigabit Internet on the offroad, just the usual mobile Internet. Play on the way or at school! Gigabit internet is useful for other things.
No limits! Choose a driver for your SUV, teach him to dance and show this dance to your opponent before off-road race. Take a dash and be the first!

🔴 EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new areas on your SUV! Explore the swamps and rural streets. If you're a fan of hill climbing, then climb steep hills, gravel road and sand dunes. Burn gasoline trying to get out of the impassable mud in which you are stuck on your truck or SUV! Asphalt? Asphalt you will also meet, but do not relax, it is very small and the joy will be short. Only offroad, only hardcore!

🔴 PUMP YOUR CAR
Need more speed? Tuning your motorsport car, SUV or truck. Want other tires? Or do not like stock discs? No problem! Accumulate money in off-road races and make plenty of shopping. Crank the radius of the wheels, engine power, winch power or put a flag for races in multiplayer. Turn your nondescript jeep into a monster-SUV, which will not be afraid of off-road! It turns out almost a simulator of an SUV or a truck, show your talent as a mechanic and make tuning your car.

🔴 ADVENTURE CONTINUES
In the game you will find a large selection of various levels and daily missions that will not let you get bored. Rial extreme guarantees you an interesting physics of cars, destructible objects on the map. Race on the buggy and perform interesting tasks, get rewards, open new trucks and SUVs. Perform tasks on trucks and carry cargo, roll on a buggy in daily missions. Have fun to the full!

🔴 WHO WILL LOVE OUR GAME
If you like 4x4 SUVs, truck simulator, buggies and all-wheel drive pickups. Or you get tired of the usual racing in traffic and you want an off-road racing, real off-road and powerful wheelbarrows, then this game is for you! Have you wanted to see how a powerful car makes drift in a swamp? Or maybe you like the dirt rally format or Dirt freestyle-racing. In any case, you should try to download and play our game. Moreover, it is absolutely FREE!

If you find any errors or comments on the game, feel free to write to the reviews!

Have a good game, friends!
